intro: Palicourea mollis, commonly known as the pink-flowered evergreen, is a tropical plant native to Central and South America. The plant produces small, fragrant flowers that range in color from white to pink, often clustered in terminal panicles. Palicourea mollis is often cultivated as an ornamental plant for its attractive appearance and ability to thrive in humid, shaded environments.
